ygData.msgSnippet: Yea pets eat up alotta fame just like a warrior of the same level would a good tactics is reclaim the pet s energy when the creature is few hits away from
ygData.messageBody:
Yea pets eat up alotta fame
just like a warrior of the same level would
a good tactics is reclaim the pet's energy when the creature is few hits
away from death
